current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Expressing the sense of the Senate
		  condemning the targeting of Tea Party groups by the Internal Revenue Service
		  and calling for an investigation.

condemns the actions of all individuals and entities involved in the

text.#text:
Whereas it is a well-founded principle that the power to
			 tax involves the power to destroy;

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
targeted Tea Party groups in a manner that infringes on the free association
			 rights and free speech rights of those groups;

used the taxing power as a political tool
			 to intimidate Tea Party groups from engaging in free speech;
